languages.text: "Ты убивал невинных после того, как сбежал?"
"Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"
languages.original_text: "Ты убивал невинных после того, как сбежал?"

traits.locale_text: "Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"
"Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"
"Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"
"Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"
"Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"
"Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"

languages.text: « Avez-vous tué d'autres âmes innocentes depuis que vous avez pris la fuite ? »
languages.original_text: "Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous tué d'autres âmes innocentes depuis que vous avez pris la fuite ? »

languages.text: «¿Ha matado a algún otro inocente desde que se fugó?».
languages.original_text: "Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Ha matado a algún otro inocente desde que se fugó?».

languages.text: 「逃げた後も、また罪のない魂を殺したのか？」
languages.original_text: "Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"

traits.locale_text: 「逃げた後も、また罪のない魂を殺したのか？」

languages.text: “你逃跑之后，还在继续谋杀无辜之人吗？”
languages.original_text: "Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"

traits.locale_text: “你逃跑之后，还在继续谋杀无辜之人吗？”

languages.text: "Habt Ihr seit Eurer Flucht weitere unschuldige Seelen getötet?"
languages.original_text: "Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr seit Eurer Flucht weitere unschuldige Seelen getötet?"

languages.text: "Kaçtıktan sonra başka masumları öldürdün mü peki?"
languages.original_text: "Have you killed any more innocent souls since you ran?"
